column1:
"Covid-19 problems require Covidlike solutions"
- An Aatmanirbhar Covidian

Definition of a Covidian - "The one who has lost his job during Covid-19 crisis because a stupid Microbe got Viral"

Covidian is not just a term, not just a single person. But it's a community, it's a league, it's about all those highly passionate but struggling Job-hunters.

In my desperate attempt to address the challenges faced by Covidians, here's a brief Professional Persona of a Covidian.

This is a post by a Covidian, for all the Covidians, to help the Covidians.

Request everyone to make it as Viral as possible, just like Covid-19 üòÇ

Cheers to all the Covidians ‚úåÔ∏è

READ..LIKE..SHARE..COMMENT, Because together we can fight it.
